snippet: WALTUCH--Randall E. You left us so suddenly a year ago and none of your family will ever be the same again. Your stoic business acumen has proven one of your legacies, along with your kind loving nature. We miss you and will forever. Your loving family 1/3
lead_paragraph: WALTUCH--Randall E. You left us so suddenly a year ago and none of your family will ever be the same again. Your stoic business acumen has proven one of your legacies, along with your kind loving nature. We miss you and will forever. Your loving family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  WALTUCH, RANDALL E
